episodes.title: Shocking Be Scofield Report: Jaggi Vasudev's Dark Secrets & Fraudulent Legacy Exposed
episodes.description:
Dive into the explosive revelations from Be Scofield’s investigative report on Jaggi Vasudev, popularly known as Sadhguru, and his Isha Foundation. This video uncovers allegations of fraud, manipulation, and a legacy tainted by controversy, as detailed in GuruMag’s shocking exposé. From unverified claims to legal battles, we explore how spirituality has allegedly been turned into a business empire. Watch to learn about the accusations of illegal constructions, tax evasion, and the mysterious death of Sadhguru’s wife, Vijji. Stay informed and join the discussion on this controversial figure!

episodes.title: Prashant Bhushan Echoes Voice Against Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev & Shyam Meera Singh Video Removal Order
episodes.description:
In this video, we explore the escalating controversy surrounding Prashant Bhushan’s vocal support for YouTuber Shyam Meera Singh after the Delhi High Court ordered the removal of Singh’s video targeting Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev and the Isha Foundation. Recorded on March 14, 2025, we delve into Bhushan’s stance against the court’s decision, which deemed Singh’s video—titled “Sadhguru EXPOSED”—defamatory, citing unverified claims about the ashram. We’ll unpack the legal battle, public reactions, and the broader debate over free speech versus reputation, as tensions rise with the next hearing set for May. Has Singh’s exposé crossed a line, or is this a clampdown on dissent? 

Join us for an in-depth analysis of this trending saga shaking up India’s spiritual and legal landscape.
